item.title: Bitcoin Exchange Kraken Hires Financial Law Veteran as General Counsel
item.description:
Bitcoin Exchange Kraken Hires Financial Law Veteran as General Counsel

Kraken, one of the largest bitcoin exchanges in the world has announced the appointment of Edward Stadum, a lawyer and fintech advisor with over five decades of legal experience and insight into international law. Global Bitcoin exchange Kraken has hired Edward M. Stadum as its General Counsel.

item.title: BitcoinAverage To Provide More Accurate Bitcoin Price Index
item.description:
BitcoinAverage To Provide More Accurate Bitcoin Price Index

Leading Bitcoin price index, BitcoinAverage, has announced the release of its new system. It claims to revamp the pricing index to accommodate the needs of users at every level from casual to enterprise-grade.

item.description:

Here's what we are looking at in today's bitcoin price, European morning session on Wednesday Once again, let's kick things of with a chart. item.title: 10% of Americans Used Bitcoin to Ignore Identity Theft
item.description:
10% of Americans Used Bitcoin to Ignore Identity Theft

Using cash or checks more often is another great way to avoid the majority of identity theft threats, although any paper trail is still a line of breadcrumbs waiting to be used maliciously. Bitcoin is often referred to as a way to avoid taxes and conduct illegal activity online.

item.title: I bough 1BTC and the transaction was instantaneously, how?
item.description:
I bough 1BTC and the transaction was instantaneously, how?

So I went to localbitcoin, I met a random guy at a starbucks gave him the money and he transfered 1BTC with his cellphone to my blockchain.info account, I though I would have to wait at very least 10

item.title: Bitcoin Price Watch; Here's What's on Tonight - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Watch; Here's What's on Tonight - NEWSBTC

Here's what were looking at tonight in the bitcoin price for our breakout strategy. In this morning's bitcoin price watch piece, our primary focus was on the upside momentum we saw throughout the evening and Asian session on Tuesday, and how we could interpret this action as far as gaining insight into today's volatility was concerned.

item.title: E-Commerce is Booming in India, Bitcoin is the Future
item.description:
E-Commerce is Booming in India, Bitcoin is the Future

This is the year that eCommerce will see big development in India. Morgan Stanley Research reports a 50% increase from last year. They rank India as the 10th largest economy in the world, with a forecasted GDP growth of around 5.5%.

item.title: Netflix Competitor Crackle Is Banking on a Show About Bitcoin, er, GenCoin
item.description:
Netflix Competitor Crackle Is Banking on a Show About Bitcoin, er, GenCoin

Right, OK, so let's get this out of the way. There's a new gritty TV drama about bitcoin-except it's called GenCoin, it stars Adam Brody, it's called StartUp because of course it is, it's a Crackle Originalâ„¢, and the first trailer is out today, which is also 4/20.

item.title: P2P Money Transfer Firm CEO: Bitcoin Is Dead
item.description:
P2P Money Transfer Firm CEO: Bitcoin Is Dead

It has been said plenty of times in the past and it'll be said again in the future. Taavet Hinrikus, CEO of TransferWise, a popular peer-to-peer international money transfer service has stated that bitcoin, is dead. TransferWise is a prominent player in the Fintech space.
